meaningMnemonic: The <radical>mountain</radical> radical and the <kanji>mountain</kanji> kanji are the same.
readingMnemonic: Think about <kanji>mountains</kanji> talking to each other, calling each other by their names and adding the Japanese name-ender <reading>san</reading> (さん) to each of their names. "Hello, Everest-<reading>san</reading>." "Oh hi, Fuji-<reading>san</reading>."
